overview: From 2025-11-09 to 2025-11-16, ethereum-optimism/optimism had 4 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 5 active contributors.

topPRs.title: op-devstack: add WithArchive matcher
topPRs.author: joshklop
topPRs.body: and use it in the pectra acceptance tests.

topPRs.title: fix: de-flakify ecotone/TestFees by reading balances from specific blocks
topPRs.author: avorylli
topPRs.body:
Fixes #18082

Fix flaky test by reading balances from specific blocks instead of latest block to avoid race conditions when new blocks are mined between balance reads.

topPRs.title: fix: resolve race condition in ThrottleController.Update method
topPRs.author: forkfury
topPRs.body:
Fix race condition in ThrottleController.Update by changing RLock to Lock

The Update method was using RLock to read strategy reference, then calling
strategy.Update() without holding the lock. This created a race condition
where SetStrategy could change the strategy between reading the reference
and using it, leading to inconsistent throttling behavior.

Using Lock instead of RLock ensures the entire Update operation is atomic,
preventing SetStrategy from modifying the strategy while Update executes.
This guarantees thread safety when controller type is changed at runtime.

topPRs.title: op-devstack: refactor how L2 forks are required
topPRs.author: joshklop

topPRs.title: op-acceptance-tests: only run Ecotone fees test against compatible networks
topPRs.author: joshklop
